name: Indie Quest!
description:
Indie Quest! puts you into the life of an indie game developer trying to balance their life. Will you choose indie fame and glory or friends and stability? How will you spend your time and energy? Decide with each action as the time ticks down in this Indie Dev Sim!

I also couldn't test anything but the Windows build; but they all should run. If there's an serious bugs let me know! And let me know what you think! I didn't have the time or sanity to make a tutorial so I left a tutorial README in the ZIPs!

Character Assets made with Pixel Character Creator

Interface Assets made by Michael Bentley

Everything else made by Vespir Belmont (ME!)
